posts.author: Jim Perry
posts.excerpt: Welcome to the new local blog system. This is a sample post to demonstrate the functionality of our self-hosted blog platform.
posts.content:
Welcome to Your Local Blog

Welcome to the Happy AI Path local blog! This is your first post using the new local blog system.

You can now manage all your blog posts locally without relying on external platforms like Blogger. Use the blog admin interface to create, edit, and delete posts easily.

This local blog system gives you complete control over your content while maintaining all the SEO benefits and beautiful design you're accustomed to.

Features

  • Local data storage using JSON
  • Easy-to-use admin interface
  • SEO-optimized blog post pages
  • Responsive design
  • No external dependencies

Start creating your own content by visiting the blog admin page!
